name: AisensumInternational Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of Robotic Process Automation (RBS) tools intended to help in the collection of accurate data. The company's tools include monetizing retail, telco, pharma, and finance data assets from startups through a revenue share arrangement as well as artificial intelligence modules which are designed to sit within legacy systems and help improve system performance over time, enabling businesses to access a lower-cost alternative to automated AI platforms.
one_liner: Developer of Robotic Process Automation (RBS) tools intended to help in the collection of accurate data. The company's tools include monetizing retail, telco, pharma, and finance data assets from startups through a revenue share arrangement as well as artificial intelligence modules which are designed to sit within legacy systems and help improve system performance over time, enabling businesses to access a lower-cost alternative to automated AI platforms.
